note.p: Career: Entered the Society of Jesus (Jesuit) (1853); went to Stonyhurst College (1856); ordained Priest (1866); Director of the Astronomical and Meteorological Observatories, Stonyhurst; Lecturer in Astronomy and Mathematics, Stonyhurst College; led several eclipse expeditions; contracted a disease whilst leading an eclipse expedition on the Isles du Salut, off French Guiana, of which he died
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1890 vol 48 pp xii-xv signed by A A C
References: Dr George Bishop, 'Stephen Joseph Perry 1833-1889 : priest, scientists, educator' Thesis (MSc) - UMIST, 1977
Father Cortie, 'Father Stephen Joseph Perry, SJ', The Month LXVIII (January - April 1890), p 305, p 474
